text: Walter Mafli (May 10, 1915 - December 11, 2017) was a Swiss painter. He was born in Rebstein, Canton of St. Gallen. He was known for his work Le chant de la mati√®re (1985) which hangs in Lausanne. In 2010, Mafli was accused of tax fraud. He was the student of well known French painters Casimir Reymond and Marcel Poncet.
